block.p: GENN-Fannie. Albert Einstein College of Medicine of Yeshiva University mourns the passing of Fannie Genn, beloved mother of Emanuel Genn, our Associate Dean for Business Affairs and a friend and colleague for more than 25 years. We extend our deepest and most heartfelt sympathy to Manny and to the entire Genn family. Dominick P. Purpura, M.D. The Marilyn and Stanley M. Katz Dean Albert Einstein College of Medicine of Yeshiva University
